item.title: Artesian House Case Study
item.description: Artesian House, an LLC located in Stuart, Florida was losing about $10,000 dollars a year due to fees when collecting payments. After implementing one of our products (my halfway) this expense went down to zero. As another value-add, we simplified their client onboarding process and helped them become 100% paperless. This equated to more cost savings due to expenses and employee time.
